div.p:
Dr Kirk & I con-
sider the value of the boat will
fully be covered by £5. This
arrangement will prevent
any grumbling on the part
of the heir. It must be
used to carry Ali & Mabruck
with their luggage first.

Be so kind as look into
Poor Thornton's boxes for
any manuscripts or
other things that his friends
are likely to value as
keepsakes, and have them
ready for me by, say
Tuesday next to clap
into a box which I take from
thus with all similar things
I dontdon't wish to stay more
than necessary with my
motley crew.

We tried our oxen yesterday
& found them difficult to
manage after such long
idleness. For a heavy
load double the number are
necessary so I mean to
send to Senna for some
more. They know the
Tsetse & will avoid it. This
may be a route for cattle
for us all but in the
mean timemeantime I dontdon't know
whether Mr Ferraõ will
sell any and I offer young
cows to each as wages - rather
too much for a constancy

These sad events - Scudamore
Dickinson - Thornton called
away in addition to the
losses of the bishop &
Burrup cast a deep
gloom over our future
I should ˄ not wonder in the
least to be recalled. For
should the Portuguese
persist in keeping the
rivers shut there would
be no use in trying
to developedevelop trade - they
have cleared this valley of
people - I put it on
them because famine
from drought never utterly
exterminates - The lower
parts below Elephant marsh
would all have been
cultivated & have yielded maize
in abundance & saved
multitudes. The people
lost all spirit in consequence
of hunger & disturbance
This is the way the case
appears to me. The
slaving was the root of
all the evil & slaving
has depopulated the
valley - In my case
duty would not lead
me home & home therefore
I would not go - The
Lady Nyassa would not be
paid for by Government
if the Expedition were given
up because I would
not apply for it though
it cost me double
what I intended - I meant
to ask for half only &
that when successsfully
launched on the Lake -
This however is between
ourselves - I wish to
devote everything I have
to the service of our Lord
and only wish that.
he may lead my children
to do the same - Come what
may I have found it to be
a capital good thing
to "Commit thy way unto
the Lord" &c. - and to cast
all cares on Him who
really & truly does care
for us -

Kind regards to Procter
Rowley is well but he
looks more haggard now
than he used to do - He
will write you about
Clarke should you think
of sending him - Any
commission I can
execute for you down bye
I am at your service
